{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA9400 |revision=v2 |fcc_date=06/29/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117B |manuf_rev=AC44 -88 |availability=new |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA9500V2 |ic_id=3839A-EA9500V2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1645, 639678-01, Z2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58BVG0S3HTA00 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1645 P30, 638851-05 3; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1645 P30, 638851-05 3; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG, UE1645 P30, 638851-05 3; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53134;BCM53134OKFBG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, NitroQAM |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• 2x '''2167Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., NitroQAM), :• '''600Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''5000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC5000 Tri-Band MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9400/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA9400|pid=01t34000003XEgrAAG}} *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA9500V2 Q87-EA9500V2], [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3442917 FCC label] - PSU 12V/5A {{see also|Arcadyan|Linksys|Linksys EA9500}} *[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3442860 FCC Doc] - Manuf. [[Arcadyan]] WG9117BAC44 -88 :"PN: 141911720044J R0A1" is silkscreened on the LED board. :"PN: 141911720048J R0A2" is silkscreened on the main board. FCC documents also apply to: *[[Linksys EA9500 v2]] - Has NitroQAM on 2.4GHz 802.11n *[[Linksys EA9500S]] - alternate name for the EA9500 v2 Web GUI: http://LinksysSmartWiFi.com ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm49408 BCM4908] @1.8GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex-A53) *Switch: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/ethernet-connectivity/switch-fabric/bcm53134 BCM53134] Six-Port GbE Switch ([https://docs.broadcom.com/docs/53134-PB101-R Datasheet]) :4x GbE PHY integrated, 1x RGMII and 1x RGMII/SGMII+ (1/2.5Gbps) ===Announcements=== *[http://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/tech-news-here-are-new-linksys-routers-announced-ces-2017 ''Here are the new Linksys routers announced at CES 2017'' on '''Singapore Hardware Zone'''] :"The EA9400 is an AC4000-class router. The speed rating is achieved by broadcasting 750Mbps on its 2.4GHz network and 1625Mbps each on its two 5GHz networks. It is powered by a 1.8GHz quad-core processor and features 512MB of RAM and 256MB of ROM. The interesting thing about the EA9400 router is that it supports WAN and LAN aggregation." ::This describes the CPU used in the EA9500 v2 but also suggests a 3SS device using NitroQAM instead of a 4SS device. The picture shows only 4x LAN ports instead of 8. This seems to suggest that some of our information may be wrong or plans changed after CES. ===See also=== *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[List of MU-MIMO supported devices]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] __NOTOC__
